            Hibernate maps field names using a physical strategy and an implicit strategy. If you wish to use Spring Boot's default naming strategies, the following properties need to be se:
Hm... Did we update the Spring Boot version? If so, why? If not, why did we bump the Spring Boot version here?
Yes, I updated the spring boot version, I thought it would be ok but as talked before let's keep the 2.1.13

We need a Final version here, not an Alpha. This will be backported to 1.3.1.Final.
If 2.2.Final is not an option, use 2.2.SP1 or something like that.
/cc @geoand for verification.

We agreed that the bump to 2.2 was not correct and we need to go back to 2.1.xxx
In any case @aureamunoz do keep in mind that in Quarkus master we can no longer have Alpha versions at any time.
Ok, yes. Thanks. I will do the necessary in the API and open a PR, then update this one
